123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354#include <stdio.h>#include<string.h>void getNext(char *p, int *next){    int j = 0;    next[0] = 0; // ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦æ²¡æœ‰å‰åç¼€    for (int i = 1; i < strlen(p); i++)    {        while (j > 0 && p[i] != p[j])        {            j = next[j - 1];        }        if (p[i] == p[j])        {            j++;        }        next[i] = j;    }}int kmp(char s[], char t[]){    int j = 0;    int n = strlen(t);    int next[n];    getNext(t, next);    for (int i = 0; i < strlen(s); i++)    {        while (j > 0 && s[i] != t[j])        {            j = next[j - 1];        }        if(s[i]==t[j])        {            j++;        }        if (j == strlen(t))        {            return i - j+1;        }    }    return -1;}int main(){    char s[10];    scanf("%s",s);    char t[10];    scanf("%s",t);    getchar();    printf("%d\n", kmp(s, t) + 1);    return 0;}
